name: cardano-iot-sdk
description: Comprehensive C++ SDK for integrating IoT devices with the Cardano blockchain ecosystem
author: Cardano IoT SDK Team

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make
scripts.build:release: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release .. && make
scripts.build:debug: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug .. && make
scripts.format: find src include examples -name '*.cpp' -o -name '*.h' | xargs clang-format -i
scripts.lint: find src include examples -name '*.cpp' -o -name '*.h' | xargs cpplint
